item.title: Valve
item.description: ‼️ SetDuration is an input or an output, it is used to set the “Default Run Time” on each valve in the Home.app. ‼️ RemainingDuration is an input to the Service node, used to display the remaining runtime on the current program. It cannot be sent as an output from Home.app into Node-RED. Basic Principle This is the simplest example of a Generic Valve item. The input nodes are Close, Opening, Closing and Open.
